title: What DeFi Founders Can Learn From Web2
description:
Most DeFi founders come from crypto native backgrounds, but there is much to learn from the operational mechanics and metrics of web2 companies. 

This talk will be a brief tutorial about web2 business mechanics, specifically SaaS. Concepts like unit economics, CAC, LTV, ARPU and the science of building and growing scalable companies.
